articles.content: Shahid Kapoor was one of the most ought-after actor in Bollywood prior to his marriage with Mira Rajput. While the actor is often hailed for his performances in films like Jab We Met and Kabir Singh,… [+2102 chars]

articles.title: Raj and DK remember Sameer Khakhar from his last role on Farzi - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Filmmakers Raj Nidimoru and Krishna DK, also known as Raj and DK, shared their memories of late actor Sameer Khakhar from his last role on the web series Farzi and paid tribute to the veteran who died on Wednesday. | Bollywood
articles.content: Veteran actor Sameer Khakhar, best known as his character Khopdi in the classic television show Nukkad in 1986, died due to multiple organ failure in Mumbai on Wednesday. Raj Nidimoru and Krishna DK,… [+2032 chars]
